Services & Awards

Awards and Scholarships

2010 Best Student Paper Award at ACM Graphics Interface (GI'10)
2009 Scholarship for short time academic research and expert courses abroad (KUWI) granted by Graz University of Technology
2006 Award for excellent performance as a student (Leistungsstipendium) granted by the Faculty of Computer Science, Graz University of Technology
2006 Research grant for students (Förderstipendium) awarded by the Faculty of Computer Science, Graz University of Technology
